roleset.name: unite again, bring back together

role.descr: other things, if separate from arg1

example.name: all args, sorta
example.text: The Marina also has become the focal point of city efforts [*] to reunite residents with any pets that may have fled or become lost during the earthquake.
example.arg: with any pets that may have fled or become lost during the earthquake

example.name: passive
example.text: At the same time, [six ANC colleagues, five of whom were arrested with him in 1963 and sentenced to life imprisonment,]-1 were reunited [*-1] with their families at various places around the country.
example.arg: at various places around the country

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls 36.1, 36.3.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'reunite' based on sentences in wsj.
